title: Champion Mechanic
body:
Hey guys, earlier today I came up with a mechanic which I think would bring something unique to league.

I propose for a champion that is almost entirely based of combos. Hear me out.

So imagine a champion where all  basic abilities depending on the output (example Q>E>W) changed the ability of the ulti (finisher) 

So in my head this champion would be short range and look like it has a martial art background. The champion has a low cd ulti which is completely different depending of the previous combo and can only be used when a given combo is used.

Hope my idea makes sense and you like it

Cheers

jesus

> So imagine a champion where all basic abilities depending on the output (example Q>E>W) changed the ability of the ulti (finisher)

So, depending on which order you use abilities in your ult will have a different effect?
Yeah, that's the main premise. So Q>E>W has a different ult finisher when compared to W>E>Q

I have ideas for finisher effects:

1. Gives a shield for a percentage of damage done to the executed target
2. Provides a massive speed boost to the caster
3. The execution deals splash damage
1st and 3rd make more sense to me than the 2nd in my eyes. Just my thoughts of course. Thanks for the input nevertheless.
I like the idea, you should expand on the ult out comes.
